body:
Successfully builds on macOS 10.15 with Clang 11.0.0.

Tested with Python 2.7.16, 3.7.3, 3.7.4, and 3.8.0.

Python 3.8.0 is still horribly broken (see #13256), so I wouldn't recommend anyone actually use it until a more stable point release comes out, but this PR lets it build successfully.
title: Fix Python 3.8 build on macOS
